contextTypes.name: session_summary
contextTypes.description: Reverse-chronological log of development sessions. Appends entries with timestamps. Requires session_summary template.

contextTypes.name: mental_model
contextTypes.description: Current technical architecture understanding. Replaces entire context on update. Requires mental_model template.

contextTypes.name: features
contextTypes.description: Individual feature implementation tracking. Each feature stored separately. Requires features template and feature name.

contextTypes.name: other
contextTypes.description: Arbitrary named contexts with no template requirements. Each document stored separately and requires a filename.

contextTypes.name: dev_log
contextTypes.description: Reverse-chronological development activity log. Appends timestamped entries. No template required.

contextTypes.name: start_here
contextTypes.description: Project onboarding document. Replaces entire content on update. No template required.
